product_name: O'Neill 24-7 Tech Crew Brite Blue Rashguard - Men's
long_description: Designed for countless hours in the sun, the men's O'Neill 24-7 Tech Crew Bright Blue Rashguard keeps your skin shielded for all-day comfort in and around the water. Quick-drying fabric offers lightweight, breathable protection. Flatlock seams won't chafe and ensure a streamlined look and feel. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Relaxed fit allows full range of motion, and small loop at the hem prevents shirt ride up when connected to board short laces (board shorts not included). Hand wash the men's O'Neill 24-7 Tech Crew Rashguard and drip dry.
short_description: Designed for countless hours in the sun, the men's O'Neill 24-7 Tech Crew Bright Blue Rashguard keeps your skin shielded for all-day comfort in and around the water.
